FindingName: [VULNERABLE] - Spam Policy Setting on Exchange Online Not Correctly Configured!
Description: You should set your Exchange Online Spam Policies to copy emails and notify someone when a sender in your tenant has been blocked for sending spam emails.
Remediation: 1. Connect to Exchange Online using Connect-ExchangeOnline. > 2. RUN: $BccEmailAddress = @('<INSERT-EMAIL>') 3. RUN: $NotifyEmailAddress = @('<INSERT-EMAIL>') 4. RUN: Set-HostedOutboundSpamFilterPolicy -Identity Default -BccSuspiciousOutboundAdditionalRecipients $BccEmailAddress -BccSuspiciousOutboundMail $true -NotifyOutboundSpam $true -NotifyOutboundSpamRecipients $NotifyEmailAddress

References.Text: 9.7 Deploy and Maintain Email Server Anti-Malware Protections
